## Description
Added user dashboard with real-time data updates and filtering capabilities.
Implements design from Figma mockups shared in Teams.

- [x] New feature

## Related Issue
Closes #123

## Changes Made
- Created Dashboard component with TypeScript
- Integrated WebSocket for real-time updates
- Added user filtering and search functionality
- Implemented responsive design (mobile + desktop)
- Added loading, error, and empty states
- Integrated with existing authentication
